channel.title: Port Forwarding Help
channel.description:
Chapter 5 Port forwarding (Router Users, Using Linksys) You don't use linksys? Find your router at http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm and follow the tutorial. Open your cmd by going to Start > Run > cmd. Type in `ipconfig´ It will say your default gateway, so type that in your browser and you will get a login screen. Skip the username part and fill in `admin´ at the password field. Click the Applications & Gaming tab and fill in the things. (Don't have? You don't use linksys, read first part of chapter) Start 43594 End 43594 Proctol = Both IP Address = Your IP And make sure you enable it!
Ok, so...I'm not using Linksys, so i clicked the link. I found My Router ( Actiontec MI424WR ) This is where i get stuck. I was brought [url=http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Actiontec/MI-424-WR/MI-424-WRindex.htm]here.[/url] (< Click) What exactly am i supposed to be looking for on this page? Could someone please help me with this AS SOON AS POSSIBLE?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 07:58:10 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE respond someone...[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 08:40:40 PM[/size][hr]What i see when i get to the port forwarding section is [img]http://img169.imageshack.us/img169/8800/helpoj5.png[/img][br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 09:07:37 PM[/size][hr]add me on AIM ( TylerTrademark )

item.title: Port Forwarding Help
item.dc:creator: @moparfan4tic moparfan4tic
item.description:
@moparfan4tic wrote:

Chapter 5 Port forwarding (Router Users, Using Linksys) You don't use linksys? Find your router at http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm and follow the tutorial.

Open your cmd by going to Start > Run > cmd.
Type in ipconfig´ It will say your default gateway, so type that in your browser and you will get a login screen. Skip the username part and fill inadmin´ at the password field.
Click the Applications & Gaming tab and fill in the things. (Don’t have? You don’t use linksys, read first part of chapter)
Start 43594
End 43594
Proctol = Both
IP Address = Your IP
And make sure you enable it!

Ok, so…I’m not using Linksys, so i clicked the link.
I found My Router ( Actiontec MI424WR )
This is where i get stuck.
I was brought here. (< Click)
What exactly am i supposed to be looking for on this page?

Could someone please help me with this AS SOON AS POSSIBLE?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 07:58:10 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE respond someone…[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 08:40:40 PM[/size][hr]What i see when i get to the port forwarding section is
[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 09:07:37 PM[/size][hr]add me on AIM ( TylerTrademark )

Read full topic
